answers.answer: Hi!If the urine color remains yellow after drinking a lot of water, it is important to test for two things. One is jaundice and the other is diabetes. Also, consciously record how much water you are drinking. It may not be 5-6 glasses of water a day.  Inform your gynecologist immediately. Take care!

question: i know i am about 2 months pregnant, and i have been drinking a lot of water.but my urine is stronger then before and a very noticeable yellow, could something really be wrong?
title: infection?
